actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To extend and make a technical correction to the temporary suspension of duty on certain cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) amend the article description for certain cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds, and (2) temporarily extend the duty treatment of such articles.

titles.title: To extend and make a technical correction to the temporary suspension of duty on certain cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds.
